name: SingaporeTrivia
0:
”Alexa, start Singapore Trivia”
”Alexa, launch Singapore Trivia”
”Alexa, open Singapore Trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: singapore trivia
des:
This is Trivia or Quiz game about of Singapore. It help users to develop the General Knowledge (GK) about the Singapore from history to current affairs. Which can be used in talent exams too. Every session will asks you 10 question related to Singapore, and provides four multiple choice answers. The users can respond with one, two, three or four as answer to the question. 

Hundreds of GK Question about the Singapore is in the archive, is growing continuously.

Anytime you can say 'Help' to find the rule of the Singapore Trivia Game.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
